pageContext.claim: “I have been talking about currency manipulation [by China] for a long time but I have to tell you, during the election they stopped.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely claims China stopped devaluing its currency since he took office. China had not devalued its currency for about two years prior to his election. In fact, as recently as 10 days before his announcement that China was not manipulating its currency, Trump falsely blamed China for being a “world champion” of devaluing the yuan.
